text: Rosemary Casals and Billie Jean King successfully defended their title, defeating Françoise Dürr and Ann Jones in the final, 3–6, 6–4, 7–5 to win the Ladies' Doubles tennis title at the 1968 Wimbledon Championships.100 Years of Wimbledon by Lance Tingay, Guinness Superlatives Ltd. 1977 ==Seeds== Rosie Casals / Billie Jean King (Champions) Maria Bueno / Nancy Richey (Third round) Françoise Dürr / Ann Jones (Final) Lesley Bowrey / Judy Tegart (Semifinals) ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== ==External links== * *1968 Wimbledon Championships – Women's draws and results at the International Tennis Federation Women's Doubles Category:Wimbledon Championship by year – Women's Doubles Wimbledon Championships Wimbledon Championships
title: 1968 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Doubles
